column4: Do i have to run the sega genesis emulator dgen in a terminal ( no gui ) ?
thanks, usser and Ingsoc, i'll give gens a try and google it :))
yes, dgen is terminal only, there are some efforts to properly port gens to linux, google for gens for linux theres an ubuntu forum thread with packages with the latest versions
im using 9.04 jaunty and sudo dpkg -i gens_*.deb wount work
